title: A Masterpiece in the Planning as Tadej Pogačar Reigns Supreme: ‘We Had This Stage in Mind since December’
content:
Giro d’Italia race leader now almost seven minutes clear of nearest rivals after 'queen stage' blitz: 'An amazing Tadej. It is historic.'

Read the full article at A Masterpiece in the Planning as Tadej Pogačar Reigns Supreme: ‘We Had This Stage in Mind since December’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
